Main content right, sidebar left. The sidebar comes after the main section in the source order.

Sidebar left

Main content left, sidebar right. The sidebar comes after the main section in the source order.

Sidebar right

Sidebar left

Main content right, sidebar left. The sidebar comes before the main section in the source order. Use this order when the sidebar contains a menu so the menu can appear at the top of the page when it's collapsed in small viewports.

Sidebar right

Main content left, sidebar right. The sidebar comes before the main section in the source order. Use this order when the sidebar contains a menu so the menu can appear at the top of the page when it's collapsed in small viewports.
